titleStmt.title: Surinam justice in the case of several persons proscribed by certain usurpers of power in that colony : being a publication of that perfect relation of the beginning, continuance, and end of the late disturbances in the colony of Surinam, set forth under that title, by William Byam Esq. (sometime rightfull) governour of that colony : and the vindication of those gentlemen, sufferers by his injustice, form the calummies wherewith he asperseth them in that relation / couched in the answer thereunto by Robert Sanford ...
titleStmt.author: Sanford, Robert.

notesStmt.note: "Each section of 'Byams declaration' and each deposition sworn before him is followed by Sanford's 'answer.' "--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
